definition: to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out

sentences.english: The South Korean Foreign Minister Kim Sung-hwan also said that he suspected that there were additional nuclear facilities in North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 韓國外交部長金星煥也懷疑朝鮮還有另外的核設施。

sentences.english: They also accused Heathfield of chatting up someone who worked at a U.S. nuclear facility.
sentences.chinese: 他們還指控希思菲爾德與美國核設施的工作人員搭訕。

sentences.english: North Korea has stated it will resume disablement of its nuclear facilities.
sentences.chinese: 北韓已經聲明將繼續核設施的去核化工作。

sentences.english: North Korea responded by reversing earlier steps it took to disable its primary nuclear facility at Yongbyon.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，北韓停止了先前拆除寧邊核設施的工作。

sentences.english: But he said there had been no leakage of radiation or radioactive material from nuclear facilities.
sentences.chinese: 但是他說，並沒有輻射或放射性物質從核設施中泄漏。

sentences.english: Both nuclear facilities are located above the water on coastal bluffs.
sentences.chinese: 兩座核設施都位於加州沿海斷崖上。

sentences.english: North Korea has been building a light-water reactor at its main Yongbyon nuclear complex since last year.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮自去年起就在寧邊核設施建造一座輕水反應堆。

sentences.english: North Korean officials also demolished the cooling tower at the country's Yongbyon nuclear reactor.
sentences.chinese: 另外，北韓還炸燬了寧邊核設施的冷卻塔。
這座核設施也是在俄羅斯的幫助下才建成的。

sentences.english: Iran's newly-revealed nuclear facility is open for inspection by UN experts, the country's president has said.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗總統稱，伊朗新建核設施對聯合國專家開放視察。

sentences.english: The White House has described as "regrettable" the announcement by North Korea that it is reactivating nuclear power facilities.
sentences.chinese: 美國對朝鮮重新啓動核設施的宣告表示遺憾。
